A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was just a good movie\, but not great.  There was way to much comedy relief and only a few of them hit their mark.  Also the big choreographed fight light saber fight scene seemed poorly done.  It looked like the timing was off on some of the fighters and/or they were slow in their motions.  I know disney will milk this cash cow until it is in ruins\, but I really wish they would stop after the next movie.
